[ti:Mistletoe]

[al:Weihnachten zu Hause: Christmas Pop Vol.4]

[00:00.00]Mistletoe - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:01.41]Lyrics by：Adam Messinger/Justin Bieber/Nasri Atweh
[00:02.82]Composed by：Adam Messinger/Justin Bieber/Nasri Atweh
[00:04.24]It's the most beautiful time of the year
[00:07.02]Lights fill the streets spreading so much cheer
[00:10.03]I should be playing in the winter snow
[00:12.81]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[00:15.13]
[00:15.99]I don't wanna miss out on the holiday
[00:18.84]But I can't stop staring at your face
[00:21.80]I should be playing in the winter snow
[00:24.27]
[00:24.83]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[00:27.64]With you shawty with you
[00:30.60]With you shawty with you
[00:33.37]With you under the mistletoe
[00:37.87]
[00:39.83]Everyone's gathering around the fire
[00:42.60]Chestnuts roasting like a hot July
[00:45.68]I should be chilling with my folks I know
[00:48.41]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[00:50.64]
[00:51.41]Word on the street Santa's coming tonight
[00:54.38]Reindeer's flying through the sky so high
[00:57.45]I should be making a list I know
[01:00.41]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[01:03.34]With you shawty with you
[01:06.29]With you shawty with you
[01:08.46]
[01:09.18]With you under the mistletoe
[01:13.30]
[01:15.03]With you shawty with you
[01:17.90]With you shawty with you
[01:21.02]With you under the mistletoe
[01:25.33]
[01:26.11]Ay love the wise men followed the star
[01:29.58]
[01:30.72]The way I followed my heart
[01:33.14]
[01:34.84]And it led me to a miracle
[01:37.98]Ay love don't you buy me nothing
[01:41.63]
[01:42.52]Cause I am feeling one thing your lips on my lips
[01:47.43]
[01:48.24]That's a merry merry Christmas
[01:50.34]
[01:50.88]It's the most beautiful time of the year
[01:53.70]Lights fill the streets spreading so much cheer
[01:56.75]I should be playing in the winter snow
[01:59.62]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[02:02.44]I don't wanna miss out on the holiday
[02:05.55]But I can't stop staring at your face
[02:08.02]
[02:08.64]I should be playing in the winter snow
[02:11.46]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[02:13.95]With you shawty with you
[02:16.81]With you shawty with you
[02:19.43]
[02:19.95]With you under the mistletoe
[02:24.33]
[02:26.09]With you shawty with you
[02:28.84]With you shawty with you
[02:31.96]With you under the mistletoe
[02:36.19]
[02:37.60]Kiss me underneath the mistletoe
[02:39.85]
[02:40.42]Show me baby that you love me so oh oh oh oh oh
[02:45.98]
[02:49.39]Kiss me underneath the mistletoe
[02:51.67]
[02:52.25]Show me baby that you love me so oh oh oh oh oh
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:Justin Bieber/The Starlite Orchestra]
[al:Weihnachten zu Hause: Christmas Pop Vol.4]
[by:]

[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.41]//
[00:02.82]//
[00:04.23]这是一年中最美好的时节
[00:07.02]街上张灯结彩 欢声笑语不断
[00:10.03]我本应该在雪地里玩耍
[00:12.81]现在却站在榭寄生下
[00:15.13]
[00:15.99]我不想错过这个节日
[00:18.84]但就是无法将视线从你脸上移开
